title: Porsche Reveals One-Off Panamera With a Showstopping Bespoke Interior
description: True automotive luxury is never "you get what you see." At the upper echelons of luxury, individuality is about customers who seek to make personal statements or stand out from the rest. This is why major automakers offer bespoke, custom-made experiences for prospective buyers. In fact, if the ...
titleSummary: "Panamera Luxury Revamped in Exclusive, Tailor-Made Interior Masterpiece"
descriptionSummary: In the rarefied world of luxury automobiles, exclusivity knows no bounds. High-end manufacturers cater to discerning clients who crave not only exceptional vehicles but also personalized expressions that set them apart from the crowd. Tailored experiences await those willing to push the limits of bespoke automotive craftsmanship.

title: China's New PHEV Promises 620 Miles of Range for Just $36,000
description: BYD quietly launched the Atto 2 DM-i PHEV in Europe, a remarkable plug-in hybrid crossover also available as a pure electric. It promises over 620 miles of combined range, from both a battery and a 1.5-liter four-cylinder gas engine working together. The WLTP testing cycle rates it for up to 56 ...
titleSummary: "Chinese Automaker Unveils Long-Range Hybrid at Affordable Price Point"
descriptionSummary: BYD has introduced the Atto 2 DM-i PHEV in Europe, a versatile plug-in hybrid crossover with an electric counterpart offering extended range capabilities through its dual power source setup and efficient fuel economy.

title: Over 143,000 Hyundai Santa Fe SUVs Recalled For A Safety Defect
description: It's been almost a decade since Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard 111 began a phased-in compliance schedule that mandated rearview cameras for vehicles with a gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 pounds or less, but in 2025, several automakers have been struggling with the law. Among those ...
titleSummary: "Huge Recall Issued for Hyundai's Popular Santa Fe Models Due to Critical Design Flaw"
descriptionSummary: A regulatory deadline looms for auto manufacturers as 2025 approaches, marking nearly a decade since safety standards began phasing in rearview cameras for lighter vehicles. Several major brands face compliance challenges ahead of the looming cutoff.

title: 480-HP Art Deco Speedster Debuts With Carbon Body and Coyote V8
description: Restomods have become a whole scene of their own, with countless builders remixing vintage silhouettes into something more usable today. There’s a lot of talent out there, but only a few projects really manage to rise above the noise. Every so often, one lands with a presence that doesn’t feel ...
titleSummary: "High-Octane Time Capsule: 480-HP Bullet of Steel and Muscle Unveiled"
descriptionSummary: The restomod revival has given birth to an eclectic community of builders reimagining classic designs for modern roads. Amidst the abundance, a select few creations stand out, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and style that's hard to ignore.

title: Senate Summons Detroit’s Big Three Over $50K New Cars
description: How much is the average price of new cars these days, you ask? It's now at over $50,000, which is a huge jump from about five years ago. It's mainly driven by EVs and the barrage of new models from luxury automakers, but the additional standard features are also a factor here. We're admittedly ...
titleSummary: Detroit's Iconic Automakers Face Congressional Grilling Over Skyrocketing Vehicle Prices
descriptionSummary: The average price of new cars has skyrocketed to over $50,000 in recent years, a significant increase from just five years ago. Rising demand for electric vehicles and luxury brands is partly to blame, along with enhanced standard features and model proliferation.

title: Audi Rolls Out Huge Tech Updates For Five Models—And Brings Back Buttons
description: Audi has announced several key hardware, software, and feature updates for five models. The group includes the A5, Q5, A6, A6 e-tron, and Q6-etron. Although these updates apply to the German market for now, all five of these models—including both combustion and all-electric powertrains—are sold in ...
titleSummary: "Audi Unveils Major Overhaul for Top Sellers, Revives Familiar Controls"
descriptionSummary: Audi has unveiled a range of enhancements for its A5, Q5, A6, A6 e-tron, and Q6 e-tron models, with significant updates to hardware, software, and features across the lineup, initially targeting the German market.

title: Mercedes-Benz Opens First 400 kW DC Fast Charger Hub at Starbucks
description: Mercedes-Benz has opened its first public High-Power Charging site at a Starbucks in Red Bluff, California, marking the debut of its nationwide plan to pair ultra-fast EV chargers with major retail partners. The location sits directly on the I-5 corridor, one of the busiest ...
titleSummary: "Brewing Up Speed: Mercedes-Benz Unveils High-Powered Charging Station at Popular Coffee Chain"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has unveiled its first public high-speed electric charging station at a Starbucks in Red Bluff, California, kicking off a national initiative to integrate fast-charging hubs into popular retail destinations along highways like I-5.

title: The Charger Daytona’s Dangerous and Complicated Service Procedure
description: Dodge’s all-electric Charger Daytona has been a hot topic among muscle car diehards for quite some time, but today we’re skipping the sound vs. silence debate. Instead, we’re focusing on what it’s actually like to service this new electric muscle car, why the process differs so dramatically from a ...
titleSummary: "Charger Owners Face Tricky Road Ahead with Troublesome Daytona Service Requirement"
descriptionSummary: The Dodge Charger Daytona SRT, an electrifying twist on a classic muscle car, has piqued enthusiasts' interest. We're shifting the focus away from sound comparisons and exploring the unique challenges of servicing this high-performance EV.

title: In-Car Video Streaming Is Becoming a Fad, and Audi Wants In With Disney+
description: We now live in a world where automotive features and creature comforts are abundant. One of the most recent in-car tech that's becoming a fad these days is video streaming. Yes, some cars can now stream your favorite shows and movies. While it might seem like an unnecessary "gimmick," the streaming ...
titleSummary: "Ride-Sharing with Disney+: Audi Taps into In-Vehicle Entertainment Trend"
descriptionSummary: The modern vehicle has become a luxurious haven, with advanced features and amenities at our fingertips. One of the latest in-car luxuries to gain popularity is video streaming, allowing drivers to access their favorite entertainment content on the go.

title: New Genesis G80 Magma Spied with Smart New Look and Massive 27-Inch OLED Screen
description: Our friends over at The Korean Car Blog managed to spot the updated Genesis G80 Magma, now wearing the upcoming G80 facelift and packing a completely reworked interior centered around a massive 27-inch curved OLED display. The prototype appears to merge Genesis’s new luxury-sedan design ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Futuristic G80 Magma Catches Sighting: Sleek Revamp Inside and Out"
descriptionSummary: Korean Car Blog has snapped a glimpse of the refreshed Genesis G80 Magma, boasting a striking makeover with the latest G80 facelift and an opulent interior featuring a gigantic 27-inch curved OLED screen as its centerpiece.

title: Future Minicars Designed by Gen Zs Look Delightfully Weird
description: Where is car design heading? Answering that question is well above our pay grade, but the young designers of today will be the ones responsible for the cars of tomorrow. Hey, legendary stylists such as Giorgetto Giugiaro and Marcello Gandini were juniors once. Over in Japan, Daihatsu, Toyota's ...
titleSummary: "Gen Z's Unconventional Vision for Tomorrow's Tiny Rides Takes Shape"
descriptionSummary: The future of car design is a mystery waiting to be solved by the next generation of automotive visionaries. As it was for style icons like Giugiaro and Gandini, youth will shape tomorrow's vehicles, with Asian manufacturers like Daihatsu already paving the way.

title: Land Rover Returns to Dakar With a Twin-Turbo V8 Defender Featuring ‘Flight Mode’
description: Any form of motorsport is tough, but when it comes to the ultimate test of man and machine, none come close to the Dakar Rally. It used to run from Paris to Dakar, but over the years, geopolitical issues and other factors have forced the rally to scale back a bit. In its current form, the Dakar ...
titleSummary: "V8 Fury Hits the Dunes as Land Rover Revives Dakar Dominance with 'Flight Mode' Beast"
descriptionSummary: The Dakar Rally is motorsport's ultimate proving ground, pushing drivers and their vehicles to the limits of human endurance and mechanical strength. Originally spanning from Paris to Dakar, it now takes on a different format due to changing circumstances.

title: The Aging U.S. Jeep Compass Isn’t Going Anywhere for Another Two Years
description: Jeep’s entry-level SUV occupies a simple role in the lineup, but its future in the US has been stuck in limbo. While Europe rolled out its all-new, Italy-made Compass this year, American buyers remain tied to the long-running generation that has been on sale for nearly a decade. The delay wasn’t ...
titleSummary: "Jeep's Aging Compact SUV Won't Get an Overhaul Till at Least 2025"
descriptionSummary: Jeep's compact SUV, once a straightforward choice, now faces uncertainty in the US market. The newer European model debuted recently, but American consumers are still waiting for an updated version of this aging design.

title: Nobody Wants Fiat’s Quirky SUV, So Dealers Have Slashed Prices By Over $14k
description: Fiat’s quirky but unsuccessful 500X crossover was killed off in late 2023, having last been on sale in the United States for the 2023 model year. Believe it or not, sales of the 500X have continued to trickle in this year (31 were sold in the third quarter), as the last few units to be built have ...
titleSummary: "Fiat's Oddball Crossover Stalls in Showrooms, With Steep Discounts to Clear Inventory"
descriptionSummary: Fiat's underwhelming 500X crossover met its demise at the end of 2023, marking a close to nearly four decades of sales. To some surprise, a small batch of these vehicles still found buyers in 2023, with 31 sold in the third quarter alone.

title: Tariffs Are Killing Any Chance of Kia's Pickup Truck Coming to the U.S.
description: There are heaps of cars that we wish were sold here, but regulations prevent that from happening for the most part. However, tariffs have made it harder for automakers to bring in products they believe will sell well in the US. Of course, it's not the first time tariffs have blocked cars from ...
titleSummary: U.S. Market for Kia Pickup Truck Looks Increasingly Doomed by Trade Tensions
descriptionSummary: Despite favorable market demand, regulatory hurdles and escalating tariffs continue to restrict access to popular international car models in the US, thwarting automakers' efforts to capitalize on consumer interest.

title: 2007 BMW 3 Series Wagon With a Maserati V8 and Nissan 6-Speed Is One Wild Creation—And It’s for Sale
description: A wildly modified 2007 BMW 328xi Sports Wagon, now powered by a Maserati 4.7-liter V8 and a Nissan CD009 six-speed manual, has landed on Cars & Bids with a current bid of $9,000. Finished in Sparkling Graphite Metallic and sitting on 19-inch Volk TE37SL wheels, the ...
titleSummary: "BMW 3 Series Wagon Transformed into a Rare V8- Powered Speedster with Unique Heritage"
descriptionSummary: A radical 2007 BMW 328xi Sports Wagon has hit the market, boasting an unconventional Maserati V8 engine paired with a Nissan six-speed manual transmission, and currently fetching $9,000 in bids.

title: New Boss 429 Looks Vintage but Drives Like a Modern Supercar
description: Ford built the original Boss 429 as a limited-production Mustang in 1969 and 1970, aiming squarely at the heavyweight end of the muscle car world. More than half a century later, Florida-based Revology has revived the Boss 429 name, but this time a bit differently. IN tradtional Mustang restomod ...
titleSummary: "Shocked to Speed: Retro Revival Meets Modern Muscle in the Latest 429 Masterpiece"
descriptionSummary: With its roots in Ford's iconic 1969-70 muscle car, the legendary Boss 429 has been reborn by Florida's Revology. This modern reinterpretation of the classic Mustang combines vintage flair with cutting-edge technology.

title: VinFast Faces Legal Heat After Owners Say Their EV Takes 24 Hours to Charge
description: One of the biggest pain points customers have when buying into the EV lifestyle is the battery charging time. With EV adoption still somewhat limited, automakers have been working to address this by offering more EVs that can charge quickly. One brand, though, seems to have dropped the ball in this ...
titleSummary: "Electric Dream Turns into Nightmare for VinFast Owners: Slow Charging Sparks Lawsuits"
descriptionSummary: One major hurdle for electric vehicle buyers is lengthy recharging times. To combat this, many manufacturers are developing faster-charging models, but some companies seem to be lagging behind in meeting this critical need.

title: Your “Worn-Out” EV Battery Isn’t Done—It’s Just Getting Started
description: When a dealer says an EV battery is degraded it’s, perhaps surprisingly, often still sitting on 70–80% of its original capacity. Research from the Union of Concerned Scientists puts that number right in the sweet spot. That is not scrap. That is a slightly tired athlete that no longer sprints, but ...
titleSummary: Reviving Electric: The Hidden Potential in Your 'Dead' EV Battery
descriptionSummary: Contrary to what you might think, an electric vehicle battery classified as "degraded" can still hold up to 70-80% of its original capacity, research suggests, leaving room for negotiation and potential reuse rather than outright disposal.

title: Mercedes-AMG’s New Electric GT 4-Door Is Shaping Up to Be Its Most Extreme Performance Car Yet
description: Mercedes-AMG is steadily peeling back the layers on its first ground-up electric performance sedan, the AMG GT 4-Door Coupe. After months of development sightings wrapped in thick, geometric camouflage, the electric grand tourer is now transitioning to lighter coverings. The shape underneath is ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-AMG's Electrifying Future Takes Shape with Pinnacle-Pushing 4-Door Supercar
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG has begun lifting the veil on its all-electric AMG GT 4-Door Coupe. Following a series of extensive tests swathed in intricate camo wraps, the sleek performance sedan's design is starting to take shape under newer, more subtle concealments.

title: Subaru Enthusiast Transforms Humble Crosstrek Into Hot WRX Hatchback
description: If your favorite carmaker doesn’t make the model you actually want, what do you do? For one Subaru fan from northern Virginia, the answer was to take matters into his own hands. Stephen Ketelsen’s ideal ride is a modern WRX hatchback, but Subaru only makes a WRX sedan. This led to Ketelsen creating ...
titleSummary: "From Suburban Steed to High-Octane Hot Rod: One Man's Rally-Inspired Makeover"
descriptionSummary: When a car enthusiast's dream model isn't available, they might consider taking a DIY approach. For one devoted fan in northern Virginia, that meant building his own version of the Subaru WRX he couldn't buy.

title: Kia’s Rugged EV5 Weekender Concept Looks Ready for Adventure—But the US Won’t Get It
description: Hyundai's been betting on off-road-oriented vehicles lately, with the new Crater Concept making a small splash at the LA Auto Show. Its sister company, Kia, looks just as committed to that direction. The brand already experimented with rugged "Weekender" versions of the Tasman and PV5, and the ...
titleSummary: Kia's Adventurous EV5 Takes on the Great Outdoors, But America Won't Be Invited
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's off-road ambitions are evident in its latest concepts, like the Crater. Kia, meanwhile, has been quietly building a reputation for rugged vehicles, with models like the Weekender and PV5 hinting at a growing focus on all-terrain capability.

title: Oracle’s New Lensless Headlights Fix Every Problem You Hate About Your Headlights
description: Automobile headlights have seen their fair share of innovations over the years. But perhaps the most revolutionary, dare we say, is the latest lensless technology developed by Oracle Lighting, a Louisiana-based outfit specializing in automotive illumination. It’s a ground-up rethinking of what a ...
titleSummary: "Lighting Up: Revolutionary Headlights Redefine Night Driving with Game-Changing Technology and Design"
descriptionSummary: Revolutionizing auto lighting, Oracle Lighting's trailblazing innovation replaces traditional lenses with cutting-edge tech, marking a paradigm shift in vehicle illumination. This bold departure from convention promises brighter futures for drivers and passengers alike.

title: Jeep, Ram, and Chrysler Owners Upset Over Annoying Pop-Up Ads on Their Cars’ Screens
description: Today's motorists are living in the age of the connected car, where technology and touch screens are not only a feature of a car, but have become the vehicle's functional nucleus. In many gas and electric cars sold on the market today, adjusting essential functions like climate control, heated ...
titleSummary: "Fiat Chrysler Owners Frustrated by In-Your-Face Advertising on Vehicle Infotainment Systems"
descriptionSummary: The modern driving experience has transformed into a seamless fusion of technology and convenience, with advanced infotainment systems and intuitive touch controls now at the heart of most contemporary vehicles.

title: Tesla’s ‘Full Self-Driving’ Hits a Major Roadblock as Musk Says Rivals Won’t License It
description: Elon Musk, billionaire entrepreneur and someone with questionable adherence to timelines, has constantly touted how revolutionary Tesla’s self-driving technology is. Apparently, it was the next best thing since sliced bread, but unfortunately, things are looking bleak, at least if you’re the CEO ...
titleSummary: Tesla's Autopilot Ambitions Stalled by Licensing Snags and Industry Resistance
descriptionSummary: Elon Musk's long-promised autonomous driving revolution is facing scrutiny, particularly from within his own company. As a pioneer in electric vehicles, Tesla's self-driving tech has been touted as groundbreaking, but recent developments suggest a more nuanced reality.

title: Inside Chrysler’s Radical Revival Plan: New Sedan and SRT Performance Models Coming
description: Unless you want a minivan, Chrysler’s current lineup has nothing to offer you. The brand’s presence in the United States has been reduced to the Pacifica and Voyager, both capable family vehicles but completely out of touch with the current market, which is dominated by crossovers and SUVs. But ...
titleSummary: "Chrysler's Bold Bet: Revamped Lineup Includes Sleek Sedans and High-Performance Rivals"
descriptionSummary: Chrysler's US offerings have dwindled, with only two models remaining: the Pacifica and Voyager. Both are capable family cars, yet they fail to resonate with modern consumers who increasingly favor crossovers and SUVs. However, a change may be on the horizon.

title: Next-Gen Mercedes CLA Debuts With $47k Starting Price With Tesla-Beating EV Range
description: The next-generation Mercedes-Benz CLA arrives as a clean-sheet model, headlined by its transition into an electric-first model. Officially known as the Mercedes-Benz CLA with EQ Technology, this new CLA is built atop an 800-volt architecture designed to improve efficiency, extend range, and cut ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes CLA 2.0 Unveiled with Impressive Range and an Affordable Entry Point"
descriptionSummary: Meet the latest iteration of the Mercedes-Benz CLA, a revolutionary new model that marks a bold shift towards electrification. Built on a cutting-edge 800-volt platform, it promises unparalleled efficiency and driving range.

title: Bentley Is No Longer All-In On All-Electric Lineup
description: Bentley, like so many other global automakers, pledged to go all-electric by 2035. This plan was primarily intended to meet the European Union (EU) emissions goals, which require automakers to reduce CO2 emissions from new vehicles by 2035 in an effort to reach climate neutrality by 2050. Now, the ...
titleSummary: Bentley's Electric Ambitions Take a Step Back in Sudden Shift
descriptionSummary: Bentley has committed to a full-electric lineup by 2035, driven largely by Europe's push for carbon reduction. The EU aims to slash new vehicle emissions to zero by '35, paving the way towards its own climate-neutral goal of 2050.

title: BMW Z4 Final Edition Revealed As Dark Farewell For Sporty Roadster
description: After three generations, the BMW Z4 has entered the final stage of its production run, and the brand is celebrating with the Z4 Final Edition. With no successor in sight, the Z4 must be appreciated while it’s still around—Audi has already discontinued the TT and Mercedes no longer makes the SLK, ...
titleSummary: "BMW Bids Farewell to Z4 with Moody Final Edition Roadster"
descriptionSummary: The BMW Z4's three-decade journey is coming to a close, marking the final production run of this iconic roadster. The Z4 Final Edition serves as a fitting tribute before its eventual retirement, joining the ranks of other abandoned models like Audi's TT and Mercedes' SLK.

title: BMW Might Revisit a Clever EV Idea It Abandoned Years Ago
description: Sometimes, taking a step forward in innovation requires looking back at good ideas that you had in the past. For German luxury giant BMW, it may be reviving something it once deemed unnecessary. According to a recent report published by Bloomberg, sources within the Bavarian Motor Works ...
titleSummary: BMW Eyes Revival of Innovative Electric Vehicle Concept Dropped in the Past
descriptionSummary: BMW is revisiting old concepts that were previously deemed too experimental for their brand. A recent report suggests the automaker is reconsidering ideas from past projects, potentially breathing new life into what was once considered unnecessary innovation.

title: Why Is GM Designing Its Coolest EVs for Overseas Markets?
description: General Motors just unveiled a striking electric crossover design study through its China Advanced Design studio, and American shoppers should take note of what we're not getting. Penned by designer Charles Huang for the Chinese market, the small crossover features a bold grille-free front end and ...
titleSummary: "GM's Global Ambition: Electric Dreams Built for Foreign Shores First"
descriptionSummary: In a significant departure from its previous designs, General Motors has revealed an electrifying concept through its China-based design studio. This striking crossover boasts a sleek, frontal design devoid of a traditional grille, hinting at a new direction for future models.

title: New York Moves to Ban Automakers From Charging for Built-In Car Features
description: It's now been more than five years since BMW faced uproar for potentially making certain features like heated seats only available through a subscription-based add-on, and since then, similar practices have become the norm. But now New York is fighting back, albeit without much gusto. As reported ...
titleSummary: Big Apple Cracks Down on Car Companies' Hidden Fees
descriptionSummary: A trend that started with controversy over heated seat subscriptions has taken hold in the auto industry, with manufacturers increasingly offering premium features only to those willing to pay extra through subscription-based services, prompting a pushback from New York officials.

title: Lamborghini's 10,000-RPM V8 Will Live Longer Than The Temerario Itself
description: When the glorious 5.2-liter V10 howl of the Lamborghini Huracán was consigned to the history books, enthusiasts were worried. They became even more concerned when it was announced that the mid-engine baby supercar's replacement would be powered by an engine with fewer cylinders, less displacement, ...
titleSummary: Lamborghini's Fury Engine Redefines Power Durability in Supercar History
descriptionSummary: The departure of the legendary 5.2-liter V10 from the Lamborghini Huracán sent shockwaves among enthusiasts, who were further dismayed by news that its successor would rely on a downsized powerplant, sparking concern about a loss of character and performance.

title: China’s Biggest EV Maker Built a Boxer Engine For Its 1,287-HP Luxury Sedan
description: Only two automakers have stuck to the flat or boxer layout over the years. That would be Porsche and Subaru, and we don't see anyone else joining them soon. But here comes Chinese automaker BYD, seemingly out of nowhere, making one. It's a bit of a surprise, given that BYD already has its own ...
titleSummary: "Beijing's Electric Giant Cranks Out Insane Horsepower with High-Tech Muscle Car V8"
descriptionSummary: In an unexpected turn, Chinese automaker BYD is bucking convention by introducing a flat-four engine layout, a niche design previously dominated by Porsche and Subaru. This move comes as a surprise to industry observers.

title: How This Ford Truck With 28,000 Christmas Lights Saves Lives
description: It’s that time of year again, when everyone tapes a sea of LEDs to their cars in the name of holiday spirit. While most builds aim to impress or grab as much attention as possible, a small handful have a deeper meaning behind them. Reed Taylor’s Ford Super Duty falls into that latter, turning heads ...
titleSummary: "Decked-Out Rescue Vehicle Brings Holiday Cheer and Hope to Disaster Zones"
descriptionSummary: As the holiday season descends, vehicles transform with twinkling lights and creative flair. But one Ford Super Duty stands out for its thoughtful design, rather than mere spectacle, sparking admiration from passersby as it cruises through the winter wonderland.

title: 1977 Porsche 911 Built for the Track With 3.8L Flat-Six Makes Modern Porsches Look Tame
description: A heavily modified 1977 Porsche 911 Coupe has hit Cars & Bids with a current bid of $77,777, offering one of the most extensively race-prepared air-cooled builds currently on the site. Finished in blue and black with a stripped, competition-focused cabin, the car carries a clean ...
titleSummary: "Porsche's Unbridled Beast: A Fierce '77 911 Proves Today's Cars Are Just Civilized"
descriptionSummary: This 1977 Porsche 911 Coupe has been meticulously transformed into a high-performance racing machine, boasting an impressive array of modifications that make it a standout among air-cooled 911s currently listed on Cars & Bids.

title: Dartz Is Returning With Another Wild Creation—And It's Coming to America
description: It's not every day you get a personal message from a company CEO, but if it's from a company called Dartz Motorz (yes, with Zs), we couldn't help but pay attention. Leonard Yankelovich has turned this once-obscure Latvian marque into a name recognized far beyond the automotive world, partly because ...
titleSummary: "Dartz Unleashes Next-Big-Thing Roadster in Shocking Stateside Debut"
descriptionSummary: Dartz Motorz' CEO has sent out a personal message that's piqued our interest. Under Leonard Yankelovich's leadership, this once-unknown Latvian brand has made waves globally, thanks to its bold approach and innovative spirit.

title: Hyundai Says It Has Overtaken Volkswagen as the World’s No. 2 Most Profitable Automaker
description: Hyundai Motor Group says it has now passed Volkswagen Group to become the second-most profitable automaker in the world, a milestone confirmed by CEO José Muñoz during a recent media briefing in France. Muñoz claimed Hyundai has been the world’s No. 3 automaker by volume for several years, but ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Crown Slips as Hyundai Takes Silver in Global Auto Sales
descriptionSummary: Hyundai Motor Group has surged past Volkswagen to become the second-most profitable automobile manufacturer globally, according to CEO José Muñoz, who made the announcement during a media gathering in France recently.

title: GM Boosts 10-Speed Transmission Output With $300 Million Investment
description: General Motors is putting another $300 million into its Romulus Propulsion Systems plant in Michigan, part of a wider $550 million manufacturing package aimed at preparing GM for a major North American production ramp-up in 2027. The move expands output of GM’s ...
titleSummary: "GM Doubles Down on 10-Speed Transmissions with Hefty Investment Push"
descriptionSummary: General Motors is injecting an additional $300 million into its Romulus facility to enhance production capacity ahead of a significant North American expansion scheduled for 2027, as part of a broader $550 million investment plan.

title: Hyundai Crater Concept Signals Serious Off-Road Ambitions
description: The Hyundai Crater Concept was easily the most intriguing model to emerge from this year’s Los Angeles Auto Show – and, despite its name, you shouldn’t confuse it with the typical fantasy in chrome show car. “This is not just a concept car,” acknowledged SangYup Lee, executive vice president and ...
titleSummary: Hyundai Hints at Aggressive New 4x4 Strategy with Daring Concept Debut
descriptionSummary: At this year's Los Angeles Auto Show, Hyundai unveiled the Crater Concept, a design that defied expectations of traditional concept cars. It's a grounded approach to automotive innovation, rather than a flashy fantasy in chrome.
